text: Such a nostalgic song. When I was little I even teared up after listening to it wooo lord I was about 6 or 7 years old when this game came out. I remember My brother and I playing this game on school days late at night. Beautiful music. I seriously hope shadow hearts 4 comes out

text:
Exactly! I never got to play the second one, but it was that "dark" feeling that made the game unique in the first place. The third game felt like a farce and was just weird at points; "Woah...so, a cat is running the Chicago underworld...um, okay...?"

Ditto on the "you won...but you still lost part." Especially considering which ending is canon.
